alert.note: Alert for Southern Trinity (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 08 at 9:55AM PST until March 09 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING ABOVE 3500 FEET... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 10 AM PST THIS MORNING ABOVE 1500 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible above 3500 feet. Total snow accumulations of up to 9 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Southern Trinity County. * WHEN...From Thursday morning through Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels will start out around 3000 feet on Thursday and rise over 4500 feet by Thursday evening.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
